definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: The paper had been sealed in several places with a thimble by way of seal;
sentences.chinese: 文件有幾個地方用頂針代替封蠟密封起來。

sentences.english: There can be no doubt about the relatedness of thimble to thumb.
sentences.chinese: 頂針毫無疑問是與拇指Thumb一詞有關。

sentences.english: When at last the party was over, Hjalmar drove home in the thimble and went to bed again.
sentences.chinese: 婚禮結束後，哈吉馬又鑽進頂針裏，回家睡覺了。

sentences.english: We are interested in plastic and metal thimbles as well.
sentences.chinese: 同時我們也對塑料的和金屬的頂針感興趣。

sentences.english: The Lord dipped His hand into the water and pulled up a golden thimble set with sapphires.
sentences.chinese: 上帝把手浸入水中撈出一個鑲嵌着藍寶石的金頂針。

sentences.english: So Hjalmar thanked her politely and climbed in the thimble.
sentences.chinese: 哈吉馬禮貌地謝過她，爬進了頂針。

sentences.english: The thimbles are made of high grade places and are size 11.
sentences.chinese: 頂針由高級地方做成並且是大小11。

sentences.english: Part of an engine nacelle and an exhaust ejector are visible at left.
sentences.chinese: 在左側可看見部分的發動機短艙和排氣頂針。

sentences.english: She put a thimble over the finger when sewing .
sentences.chinese: 縫紉時，她在手上戴一枚頂針。

sentences.english: Etymology, it appears, has the means to prove that thimbles were at one time meant for the thumb.
sentences.chinese: 詞源學看起來有辦法證明頂針一詞曾經指拇指。

sentences.english: Stick straining flake on very nether surface of half needle of posterior malleolus.
sentences.chinese: 於後踝頂針下表面貼應變片，並與應變儀導線連接。

sentences.english: EJ pin is too close to the cooling, could we change a smaller EJ pin?
sentences.chinese: 頂針與運水距離較近，可以將頂針改小嗎？

sentences.english: EJ pin is too close to the cooling, could we change a smaller EJ pin?
sentences.chinese: 頂針與運水距離較近，可以將頂針改小嗎？

sentences.english: Inside me I couldn't help feeling she ought to have given me thanks for finding the thimble.
sentences.chinese: 常打心眼裏覺得，我幫忙找到頂針，她該謝我。

definition: to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
